refnamediv.refpurpose: grants deployment rights to the specified user on the given partition

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: kaadduser grants deployment rights to the specified user on the given partition

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: -l, --login login the login of the user. This option can be used more than once to specify several users. By default, the deployment rights are granted to all the users.
-m, --machine hostname specifies a host. This option can be used more than once to specify several hosts. By default, the deployment rights are granted for all the nodes.
-p, --partition partition the target partition. This option can be used more than once to specify several partitions. By default, the deployment rights are granted for all the partitions.*

refsect1.title: RETURN VALUE
refsect1.para: kaadduser returns 0 if it fails. Otherwise, it returns 1.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: kaadduser -l titi -p hda3 -m node1 grants rights to user titi on node "node1" on partition hda3

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.command: kaadduser, kadeluser, kaconsole, kacreateenv, kaaddnode, kadelnode, kadeploy, kareboot
